message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $85. Could you do $90?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Can you do $87.50?
